original_text: And there shall be no remnant of them: for I will bring evil upon the men of Anathoth, even the year of their visitation.
korean_text: 남는 자가 없으리라 내가 아나돗 사람에게 재앙을 내리리니 곧 그들을 벌할 해에니라

sentences.original_text: And there shall be no remnant of them:
for I will bring evil upon the men of Anathoth,
even the year of their visitation.
